name: Snipi
overview:
Snipi is a patent-pending system for social shopping in the online retail market. Founded in 2007, Snipi empowers the individualâ€™s shopping experience and is the easy way to organize, discover and share the internet.

With it’s unparalleled drag and drop toolbar technology, Snipi allows consumers to drag a photo, video or product off of any webpage and drop it to the Snipi Toolbar. Snipi will automatically save it to a personal profile.

Consumers can review their shopping, photos and videos lists anytime-whether theyâ€™re at home or on the go. Snips are available at Snipi.com, in the Snipi Toolbar when you visit any website or on the Snipi iPhone application.

Looking for a great deal? Just snip a product and Snipi will compare prices from retailers, and gather customer reviews. Shopping offline? See your products and wishlists on-the-fly using the Snipi iPhone application.

Want to share that viral video, silly photo or new digital camera with a friend? Invite anyone to view, comment and rate your snips. Connect with friends at Snipi.com and share lists, or let Snipi send snips to your Facebook profile or WordPress blog.

milestones.description: Snipi launches toolbar and mobile app
milestones.source_description: Snipi, Inc. Launches New System for Social Shopping
